name: Basil
description: A fragrant herb with tender leaves that is commonly used in Italian cuisine

name: Rosemary
description: An evergreen herb with a strong, aromatic flavor that is often used in Mediterranean dishes

name: Mint
description: A refreshing herb with a bright, cool flavor that is commonly used in drinks and desserts

name: Sage
description: An herb with a slightly bitter flavor that is commonly used in Italian and Balkan cuisines

name: Thyme
description: An herb with a warm, earthy flavor that is commonly used in French and Mediterranean cuisines

name: Oregano
description: An herb with a pungent, slightly bitter flavor that is commonly used in Italian and Greek cuisines

name: Chives
description: An herb with a mild, onion-like flavor that is commonly used in salads and dips

name: Cilantro
description: An herb with a bright, citrusy flavor that is commonly used in Latin American and Asian cuisines
